projects.title: Petit
projects.description: A cross-platform Flutter application capable of compressing images in various formats, like  JPEG, JPG, PNG, WEBP, HEIC, and HEIF, for efficient storage and faster file transfers without compromising quality

projects.title: Habitar
projects.description: A habit-tracking app using Flutter, integrating Bloc and Flutter Super for robust state management. Applied clean architecture principles to ensure clear feature separation. Leveraged Firebase for authentication and remote data storage, enabling secure, scalable access. Incorporated Flutter Drift database to store habits locally, ensuring the app works seamlessly offline. Implemented push notifications to remind users of their goals based on customized parameters, promoting habit consistency across Android, iOS, windows, and linux.

projects.title: Watchlist
projects.description: Watchlist is an Android application leveraging TMDB API, to offer access to an ever-increasing database of over 2 million movies and TV series, and integrating an efficient paginated search and favourites management feature. It also Implements a visually pleasing UI using Jetpack Compose, adhering to Material 3 Design principles, improving user engagement

projects.title: Devfesttttt
projects.description: A wear Os verion of the devfest 2022 mobile app. It is a multi-module application that connects and transfers data between the paired Android and Wear os devices. It Displays the agenda, program sessions, and speakers details for the Devfest event.

projects.title: Class Konnect
projects.description: An Android video call app made using Jitsi Meet SDK to improve E-Learning in educational institutions. It can connects up to 75 participants / students learning synchronously from a live video conferencing lecture for free.

projects.title: Bill Reminder
projects.description: A Reminder app that saves paid and unpaid bill along with their details in a local room database. It uses Alarm Manager and Notification Manager to send reminder notifications for unpaid bills in due time. It complise with Material design guidelines.

projects.title: 2FA
projects.description: An authentication android app that generates Time-Based One-Time-Passwords for online authentication. It was developed using Kotlin, Room database, Jetpack Datastore, and Base32 for encoding and decoding. It leverages github actions for CI/CD and generate an apk artifacts on push.
